description: Maxwell Bates graduated from UC Berkeley in 2012 with a B.S. in Bioengineering and focus on Genetic Engineering. He began working on the Clotho project in the summer prior to his graduation, and was the primary front end developer until late 2014. His interests revolve around the empowerment of individuals through online education, and the empowerment of patients toward personalizing medicine. Max is now a Software Engineer at Autodesk, working on the Cyborg project.
name: Maxwell Bates
title: Front End Developer
